description: This is a market on whether the Bongcloud Opening will be played during the FTX Crypto Cup, scheduled to take place between May 23, 2021 and May 31, 2021. This market will resolve to “Yes” if any of the official tournament games during the FTX Crypto cup has white’s 2nd move as Ke2, regardless of black’s first move, and “No” otherwise. If games are postponed on or before June 15, 2021, the same market conditions will apply. If games are postponed after June 15 or cancelled altogether, they will not be considered for this market’s resolution. In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved in good faith at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).

markets.question: Will the Bongcloud be played during the FTX Crypto Cup?

title: Will the Bongcloud be played during the FTX Crypto Cup?
